about.title: Empowering Your Future
about.description: Dublish Institute is a leading educational institution that offers a wide range of courses to help you achieve your goals and elevate your skills. Our expert lecturers and interactive courses are designed to guide you on the right learning path to success.
about.whoAreWeDescription: Dublish Institute is a leading educational institution that offers a wide range of courses to help you achieve your goals and elevate your skills. Our expert lecturers and interactive courses are designed to guide you on the right learning path to success.

whyChooseUsArr.title: Expert Instructors
whyChooseUsArr.description: Learn from top professionals with years of industry experience.

whyChooseUsArr.title: Interactive Learning
whyChooseUsArr.description: Apply your knowledge through hands-on projects and activities.

whyChooseUsArr.title: Recognized Certifications
whyChooseUsArr.description: Earn certifications that highlight your skills and boost your career.

about.startLearningTodayDescription: Don't wait to achieve your goals. Join our platform and begin your journey of growth, learning, and success.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about Dublish Institute and our services.

questions.question: What types of courses do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of courses, including language learning, development, and ICDL certifications. Each course is designed to meet the needs of beginners and advanced learners alike.

questions.question: How can I enroll in a course?
questions.answer: Enrolling in a course is simple! Create an account, browse our course catalog, select the course you want, and complete the payment process.

questions.question: Do you provide certifications?
questions.answer: Yes! Upon successfully completing a course, you will receive a recognized certification to showcase your skills and knowledge.

questions.question: Are the courses self-paced?
questions.answer: Yes, most of our courses are self-paced, allowing you to learn at your convenience. However, some courses may have live sessions or fixed schedules.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept a variety of payment methods, including credit cards, PayPal, and other secure online payment options.

questions.question: Can I get a refund if I’m not satisfied?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you’re not happy with a course, you can request a refund within the specified period.

support.title: Get in Touch
support.description: Have a question or need assistance? Contact our support team for help.
support.success: Your message has been sent successfully!
